text: We are at Baby King Kitchen to find delicious Kid's Lunch!
To give grown-ups chances to eat Kid's Lunch that only kids are allowed to eat...
...the people at Baby King Kitchen are always putting their hearts into serving delicious Kid's Lunch.
Do you get customers from overseas?
Kid's Lunch makes us happy!
I want everyone to eat it!
Was I dreaming about Kid's Lunch?
What? This is different from what I was seeing...
Aww?!
Ganso Shokuhin Sample-ya has a history of more than 80 years!
They make effort so people can not only look at, but have fun with them, as well!
That's why this place is really popular among tourists from overseas or students on school excursions.
There are many things that look interesting!
It would be great if we can have people from overseas enjoy food samples!
They look more delicious than the real thing!
I am amazed!
Don't you get excited just by looking at food samples of Kid's Lunch?
Come to think of it... I had Kid's Lunch, didn't I?
Maybe I dreamed about it, because I was too hungry...
Hmph.
I must go now.  Chef is waiting for me!
